title: 5" Steel Barrel Hinge for Driveway Gates Heavy Duty Weld on Ball Bearing (Pair)
features: Features grease zerk fitting to keep the internal ball bearings lubricated.
description: This 5" Heavy Duty Barrel Hinge has 2-1/8" x 1-1/8" weld plates. Total hinge measurements are 4-13/16" x 1-3/8" with a barrel diameter of 1" and weighs 1 lbs 5.9 oz. The total capacity per pair is 600 lbs. This hinge features grease zerk fitting to keep the internal ball bearings lubricated for the best performance. This weld-on barrel hinge has a quality matte black metal powder coating finish. We recommend using multi-purpose grease once every two years for a smooth effortless operation.
